description.@en: My life of trapping and hunting has taught me to know instantly where I am and where best to look for resources to survive the harsh wilds.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: After you have successfully defeated any threat classified as an Animal or Beast, its kind becomes your chosen enemy. When striking chosen enemies, add an additional 1D6 Fury Die to Total Damage with ranged weapons. Note that there is no upper limit to the number of chosen enemy types you may have.
